section.title: CopyDnsZoneBulk Method - Atomia DNS API
section.para: Copies a complete zone to one or more other zones, overwriting any preexisting data.

section.title: Declaration syntax
section.programlisting: void CopyDnsZoneBulk( string sourcezone, string[] destinationzones )

tr.td: the name of the source zone
an array of the zone names to copy the source zone to
